website_summaries.verdict: The inside has a thick foam, which provides unparalleled security to the holder.
pros: This is the first product this company has ever made
It is stronger than most in its class and able to take an absolute beating
Versatile handles help switch gears with ease
Triple stitched seams with a nylon coating
cons: This bag is built to be broken in and needs to be used frequently in order to wear it in correctly

customer_reviews.title: If you like to kick stuff these hold up pretty well to ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like to kick stuff these hold up pretty well to punishment. Sure you can blow the stuffing out of them (really the thread just opens and you can re-close them.) Inside is a solid foam pad surround by a plastic vapor barrier. They repair easily with some needle and thread. Used them in my school and at home just working out. They do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: x21ironsides

customer_reviews.title: A very good training product for beginner to highly-proficient martial artists
customer_reviews.text: Great product - I have only started using it but am a long-time martial artist with 20+ years and know my training equipment. The seams are robust, the padding is strong and can withstand professional-experience impacts. Material also appears durable at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Holds up well over time
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and comfortable to handle. A friend of mine bought one of these a couple years ago and it has taken all the abuse that we can toss at it without blowing out stitching or getting hole in it. I bought one because of how impressed I was with the quality. It's a well made item and does what it is supposed to (take a beating).
customer_reviews.author: ThatE30Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take Krav Maga and love having my own Kick Shield for practicing at home. Professional quality.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingRosie

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has handles on both sides AND on ...
customer_reviews.text: It needs a little breaking in, but dang. This baby's a beaut. I love that it has handles on both sides AND on the bottom. Super useful for practicing multiple techniques.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for Kick training
customer_reviews.text: This Kick Shield works very well protecting the user during kick training sessions and allows the trainee to let loose with full power kicks.
customer_reviews.author: MJT

customer_reviews.title: It's very stiff when new which is a good thing, that means it's well built and designed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Well made and durable so far. I use it for front kicks, side kicks, thrust kicks and knees. It's very stiff when new which is a good thing, that means it's well built and designed for abuse. There is 4 of who use it in training and we are all heavy weights. It's gets used for an hour +/- 3 times a week for several months now. It's holding up. Worth money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AversaryOmega

customer_reviews.title: We are a family of martial artists and highly recommend this shield
customer_reviews.text: Dense foam interior allows for maximum kick protection! We are a family of martial artists and highly recommend this shield.
customer_reviews.author: starfishmom845

customer_reviews.title: ... one as the picture makes it look flimsy and poor stitching. I was very impressed with the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I almost passed on this one as the picture makes it look flimsy and poor stitching. I was very impressed with the quality and durability when I received it. The photo should be updated to show the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Revgear Kick Shield
customer_reviews.text: This kicking shield by revgear is very well made. It is very versitile and because the handles don't stick out it can be aplied to lots of different striking techniques. I use it for kickboxing as well as street tactics. This is the same exact kicking shield as the krav maga shield. The only thing different is the patch sewn on and the krav maga costs about twenty dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: beat that pad with all you got :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Strong, and perfect for long term use, easy on the holder too because of all the different handles which protects your wrists while letting your partner put their weight into hitting the pad. :)
customer_reviews.author: scopegal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the kickshield we use during Krav class. Rev Gear has some great equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: get it for kicks, literally
customer_reviews.text: This bag is tough and can take a pounding. No matter if you are doing push kick, knee strikes or roundhouse kicks this revgear bag can take all the punishment you can give it. If you can get this bag for less than a hundred bucks then you'd bee a foll not to get it even though it's worth the cost even at full retail.
customer_reviews.author: William Mott

customer_reviews.title: Great shield, very hard when new and too hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shield, very hard when new and too hard for young kids but great for power kickers. Should last a long time, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This kick shield was just what I was looking for. I've seen other people purchase other brands and by far this kick shield has withstood multiple kicks and blows far better than theirs. Also, the seams on the shield seems tighter and the shield itself seems heavier and thicker than theirs. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, durable
customer_reviews.text: Versatile tool if you know how to use it properly. We use it for all muay thai strikes. Offers great protection even with the hardest kickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really holds up to abuse. This is the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Really holds up to abuse. This is the same product used in the Krav Maga studio I go to for training.
customer_reviews.author: K. Simerly

customer_reviews.title: Time to train
customer_reviews.text: This pad is awesome, great quality! I am never disappointed with Revgear. The pad is stiff, but it is supposed to be, it takes time to break in a new pad.
customer_reviews.author: dangler

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT. Thick enough for even the strongest of kickers
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT. Thick enough for even the strongest of kickers, easy for the shield holder to use for a variety of kicks, from Muay Thai leg Kicks and knees to full power Taekwondo skipping side kicks, back kicks, etc. This Kicking Shield is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Eric St. John

customer_reviews.title: much better than cheaper versions available in local retail stores
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Much, much better than cheaper versions available in local retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Got these for home practice for kids and adults. They are very good quality and absorb adult kicks very well.
customer_reviews.author: K. G.

customer_reviews.title: Before purchasing this shield I called Revgear to determine the ...
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this shield I called Revgear to determine the difference between this shield and the Revgear Krav Maga Kick Shield. According to the rep they are exactly the same shield, except for the tag on the back. He also said that the difference between this shield and the Revgear Economy Kick Shield (listed on Amazon as "Revgear Combat Kick Shield BJJ MMA" - Manufacturer reference: 829001) is that 829001 is foreign made. However, both the Krav Maga shield and this one are made in the USA. That is why they are more expensive. I'll pay a few dollars more for US made.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E Tucker

product_meta.title: Revgear MMA Heavy Hitter Training Shield
feature_bullets: The only shield in the world designed for heavy hitters! Unique foam configuration provides unparalleled protection for the holder
Heavy 22 oz vinyl coated nylon and triple stitching can withstand any punishment you can dish out
Side handles make this pad more versatile than any shield you have ever used
Dimensions: 25 inches by 16 inches. 6 inches thick (about 64cm x 41cm x 15cm).
